text: Tear Me to Pieces is the seventh studio album by American rock band Story of the Year. The album was released on March 10, 2023 through SharpTone Records. The title track explores themes of anxiety, suffocation, and emotional struggle, as reflected in the lyrics: Tear me to pieces and swallow me / Cause I can’t kill all the anxiety / I’m suffocating and I can’t break free. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2023 albums Category:Story of the Year albums
title: Tear Me to Pieces
